text: A rubber duck, or rubber ducky, is a toy shaped like a duck. It is often yellow. Most children use them when taking baths. The Muppet Ernie sang a song about a Rubber Ducky in Sesame Street. Rubber ducks were first invented in the 17th century, and is referenced and loved a lot by many for it's very cute demeanor. It rose it popularity in the 19th century, and it is regularly made from vinyl plastic and rubber. It is very notable for its references in pop culture. ==References== Category:Toys
title: Rubber duck
